Data Fields
CSL_EpwmDeadbandCfg Struct Reference
IP » EPWM

Structure holding the dead band generation sub-module configuration parameters. More...

#include <csl_epwm.h>

Data Fields

uint32_t inputMode
 
uint32_t outputMode
 
uint32_t polaritySelect
 
uint32_t risingEdgeDelay
 
uint32_t fallingEdgeDelay
 

Detailed Description

Structure holding the dead band generation sub-module configuration parameters.

Field Documentation

uint32_t CSL_EpwmDeadbandCfg::fallingEdgeDelay

Falling edge delay count in cycles.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmDeadbandCfg::inputMode

Input mode control that selects the input source to the falling-edge and rising-edge delay. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmDbInMode_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmDeadbandCfg::outputMode

Output mode control that selectively enable or bypass the dead-band generation for the falling-edge and rising-edge delay. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmDbOutMode_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmDeadbandCfg::polaritySelect

Polarity selection control that allows selectively invert one of the delayed signals before it is sent out of the dead-band sub-module. This can take values from the following enum CSL_EpwmDbPolSel_t.

uint32_t CSL_EpwmDeadbandCfg::risingEdgeDelay

Rising edge delay count in cycles.
